title: 3DCoat
description: 3DCoat is the application that has all the tools you need to take your 3D idea from a block of digital clay all the way to a production-ready, fully textured organic or hard surface model. It combines different technologies: voxels and polygons - for 3D model creation. Today 3DCoat is available to learn at 300+ Universities, Colleges, and Schools worldwide.
